column1: Welcome to the premium counter!\nHere you can access a higher stakes cash bonus - <color=#2a822a>bigger rewards,</color> but <color=#800000>risk losing money.</color>\nOr take your members-only <color=#2a822a>reduced buy-in.</color> What'll it be?
